      • updateCategoryUsed

        public static boolean updateCategoryUsed(int categoryId,
                                         int used)
        update the how many times the category is used. The amount of times is just added to the current amount.
        Parameters:
        categoryId - specifies which category in the database.
        used - the amount of additional times it is used.
        Returns:
        boolean
